tests.name: (1.38) - Load Data
tests.description: This sample shows how to load a JSON formatted project

tests.name: (1.38) - SAPUI5 Several Instances
tests.description: This sample shows multiple instances of Visual Business on one page.

tests.name: (1.38) - Dynamic Size Sample
tests.description: This sample shows the dynamic re-sizing of the control.

tests.name: (1.38) - Language sample
tests.description: This sample tests the language support

tests.name: (1.38) - Visual Frame
tests.description: Sample demonstrates "Visual Frame" around the city of Munich. The user can not move the map to areas outside this frame.

tests.name: (1.38) - Copyright Info on Maps
tests.description: This sample shows the different alternatives how to display the copyright for Map Providers.

tests.name: (1.38) - Customize scale
tests.description: This sample shows the different alternatives how to customize the scale.

tests.name: (1.38) - Minimizing the control
tests.description: This sample shows the ability to minimize/maximize the control to a thumbnail.

tests.name: (1.38) - ZoomTo to Position
tests.description: This sample shows how to use the UI5 zoom API.

tests.name: (1.38) - ZoomTo multiple Positions
tests.description: This sample shows the UI5 Zoom API when zooming in to multiple Instances.

tests.name: (1.38) - Duet Testing (IE only)
tests.description: This sample tests the same API usage on a HTML5 and the Native implementation

tests.name: (1.38) - Spots with Icon or Text
tests.description: This sample shows spot objects with icon or text.

tests.name: (1.38) - Routes and Arrows
tests.description: This sample shows polyline objects, which can be used for simple arrows or complex routes.

tests.name: (1.38) - Routes and Arrows with triangles in between
tests.description: This sample shows routes with triangles in between showing the direction of the routes.

tests.name: (1.38) - Routes and Arrows with borders
tests.description: This sample shows Routes and Arrows with configurable border colors.

tests.name: (1.38) - Routes around the World
tests.description: This sample shows round world capabilities.

tests.name: (1.38) - Areas
tests.description: This sample shows polygon objects

tests.name: (1.38) - Multi Areas
tests.description: This sample shows multi polygon objects.

tests.name: (1.38) - Multi Areas with exclusion
tests.description: This sample shows multi polygon objects with exclusions (holes).

tests.name: (1.38) - Circles
tests.description: This sample shows circle objects. Circles can have a radius based on pixels or based on actual meters.

tests.name: (1.38) - Pies and Blocks/Boxes
tests.description: This sample shows also a simple pie chart and a box.

tests.name: (1.38) - Tooltip
tests.description: Sample for individual tooltip per Spot.

tests.name: (1.38) - Selection and Cardinality
tests.description: This sample should show the selection behavior when different selection cardinalities are specified.

tests.name: (1.38) - Multi Selection
tests.description: This sample shows the multi selection behavior of different kind of VOs.

tests.name: (1.38) - Detail Window Content
tests.description: This sample demonstrates content options for the detail window.

tests.name: (1.38) - Detail Window for route
tests.description: This sample should show flexible detail window positioning on routes.

tests.name: (1.38) - Detail Window on different devices
tests.description: This sample should show detail window design for different devices.

tests.name: (1.38) - Flexible Hot-State
tests.description: This sample shows the different hotstate combinations applied to objects.

tests.name: (1.38) - Flexible Select-State
tests.description: This sample shows the different select state and hot state combinations applied to objects.

tests.name: (1.38) - Text labels on Spots and Routes
tests.description: This sample should show text labels for spots and routes.

tests.name: (1.38) - Labels on Spots with enhanced design
tests.description: This sample shows labels on Spots with different label design capabilities.

tests.name: (1.38) - Text labels for Areas and Circles
tests.description: This sample should show labeltexts for Areas and Circles.

tests.name: (1.38) - Legend
tests.description: This sample shows a legend.

tests.name: (1.38) - Drag and Drop
tests.description: This sample shows Drag and Drop between Spots and Links.

tests.name: (1.38) - Design Mode Capabilities
tests.description: This sample should show design mode capabilities.

tests.name: (1.38) - Clustering Capabilities
tests.description: This Sample shows 2000 Spots as single objects or grid based, or distance based clustered.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Control on JS View
tests.description: This sample shows the usage of the GeoMap control that has a prototype UI5 interface used in JavaScript.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Control on XML View
tests.description: This sample shows the usage of the GeoMap control that has a prototype UI5 interface used in a XmlView notation.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Interactions
tests.description: This sample shows the possible interactions using Context Menus

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Control with Alignment of Spots
tests.description: This sample shows the usage of the GeoMap control with Configurable Alignment of Spots

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Events
tests.description: This sample shows the usage of the GeoMap events.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Initial Settings
tests.description: This sample shows the usage of the initial settings for GeoMap : scaleVisible, navcontrolVisible, initialPosition, and initialZoom.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Selection / Deselection
tests.description: This sample shows the select/deselect on GeoMap aggregations and the two-way-binding of the select property.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Tracking Modes
tests.description: This sample shows the different tracking modes for GeoMap using toolbar buttons or keystroke.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Container Interaction
tests.description: This sample shows the interaction with Container VOs independent from the hosted controls.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap 2000 VO Clustering Test
tests.description: 2000 VOs and a clustering challenge.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap 2000 VO Clustering Test with new API
tests.description: 2000 VOs and a clustering challenge. This test use the clusters aggregation and the Cluster control for visualization.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap with Heatmap
tests.description: GeoMap with Heatmap

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap with GeoJSON Feature Layers
tests.description: This sample shows how to display GeoJSON as Feature Layer on a GeoMap.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap interactive Object Creation
tests.description: This sample shows how to let user create new VOs interactively on the GeoMap.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap in a Dialog Window
tests.description: This sample checks the behaviour of the control whent it is taken out of DOM.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap Sample for Change Tracking
tests.description: This sample checks GeoMap tracking of VO changes

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap with typed Spots
tests.description: This sample shows how to use sematically typed Spots on a GeoMap.

tests.name: (1.38) - GeoMap with Spots having typed labels
tests.description: This sample shows how to use typed labels on a GeoMap.

tests.name: (1.38) - Analytic Map on JS View
tests.description: This sample shows the usage of the Visual Business AnalyticMap control.

tests.name: (1.38) - Analytic Map on Xml View
tests.description: This sample shows the usage of the Visual Business AnalyticMap control using the XmlView notation.

tests.name: (1.38) - Analytic Map with interactive Legend
tests.description: This sample shows interaction of legend and Analytic Map.

tests.name: (1.48) - Analytic Map with Labels
tests.description: This sample shows analytic map with labels

tests.name: (1.48) - GeoMap Keyboard Events
tests.description: This sample shows keyboard events functionality

tests.name: (1.48) - GeoMap-VBI Adapter
tests.description: This sample tests GeoMap to VBI Adapter functionality

tests.name: (1.50) - Zoom To By ID
tests.description: This sample shows how to zoom to areas by ID

tests.name: (1.52) - Multi hit-test on GeoMap
tests.description: This sample tests if hit-test of overlapping VOs returns all underlying VOs

tests.name: (1.38, 1.44, 1.52, 1.54, 1.56) - Adapter 3D (1)
tests.description: This sample tests Initial load, Clear scene, Object Colour & Texture in ThreeJS viewport using Adapter 3D

tests.name: (1.38, 1.44, 1.52, 1.54, 1.56) - Adapter 3D (2)
tests.description: This sample tests Events & Responsive Popover in ThreeJS viewport using Adapter 3D

tests.name: (1.52, 1.54, 1.56) - PieItem custom colours [& Click events in All Versions]
tests.description: This sample tests the click events for pie chart and the ability for you to set custom colours for pie items
